26#ifndef _I915_GUC_REG_H_
27#define _I915_GUC_REG_H_
28
29/* Definitions of GuC H/W registers, bits, etc */
30
31#define GUC_STATUS 0xc000
32#define GS_BOOTROM_SHIFT 1
33#define GS_BOOTROM_MASK (0x7F << GS_BOOTROM_SHIFT)
34#define GS_BOOTROM_RSA_FAILED (0x50 << GS_BOOTROM_SHIFT)
35#define GS_UKERNEL_SHIFT 8
36#define GS_UKERNEL_MASK (0xFF << GS_UKERNEL_SHIFT)
37#define GS_UKERNEL_LAPIC_DONE (0x30 << GS_UKERNEL_SHIFT)
38#define GS_UKERNEL_DPC_ERROR (0x60 << GS_UKERNEL_SHIFT)
39#define GS_UKERNEL_READY (0xF0 << GS_UKERNEL_SHIFT)
40#define GS_MIA_SHIFT 16
41#define GS_MIA_MASK (0x07 << GS_MIA_SHIFT)
42#define GS_MIA_CORE_STATE (1 << GS_MIA_SHIFT)
43
44#define SOFT_SCRATCH(n) (0xc180 + ((n) * 4))
45
46#define UOS_RSA_SCRATCH(i) (0xc200 + (i) * 4)
47#define DMA_ADDR_0_LOW 0xc300
48#define DMA_ADDR_0_HIGH 0xc304
49#define DMA_ADDR_1_LOW 0xc308
50#define DMA_ADDR_1_HIGH 0xc30c
51#define DMA_ADDRESS_SPACE_WOPCM (7 << 16)
52#define DMA_ADDRESS_SPACE_GTT (8 << 16)
53#define DMA_COPY_SIZE 0xc310
54#define DMA_CTRL 0xc314
55#define UOS_MOVE (1<<4)
56#define START_DMA (1<<0)
57#define DMA_GUC_WOPCM_OFFSET 0xc340
58#define GUC_WOPCM_OFFSET_VALUE 0x80000 /* 512KB */
59#define GUC_MAX_IDLE_COUNT 0xC3E4
60
61#define GUC_WOPCM_SIZE 0xc050
62#define GUC_WOPCM_SIZE_VALUE (0x80 << 12) /* 512KB */
63
64/* GuC addresses below GUC_WOPCM_TOP don't map through the GTT */
65#define GUC_WOPCM_TOP (GUC_WOPCM_SIZE_VALUE)
66
67#define GEN8_GT_PM_CONFIG 0x138140
68#define GEN9LP_GT_PM_CONFIG 0x138140
69#define GEN9_GT_PM_CONFIG 0x13816c
70#define GT_DOORBELL_ENABLE (1<<0)
71
72#define GEN8_GTCR 0x4274
73#define GEN8_GTCR_INVALIDATE (1<<0)
74
75#define GUC_ARAT_C6DIS 0xA178
76
77#define GUC_SHIM_CONTROL 0xc064
78#define GUC_DISABLE_SRAM_INIT_TO_ZEROES (1<<0)
79#define GUC_ENABLE_READ_CACHE_LOGIC (1<<1)
80#define GUC_ENABLE_MIA_CACHING (1<<2)
81#define GUC_GEN10_MSGCH_ENABLE (1<<4)
82#define GUC_ENABLE_READ_CACHE_FOR_SRAM_DATA (1<<9)
83#define GUC_ENABLE_READ_CACHE_FOR_WOPCM_DATA (1<<10)
84#define GUC_ENABLE_MIA_CLOCK_GATING (1<<15)
85#define GUC_GEN10_SHIM_WC_ENABLE (1<<21)
86
87#define GUC_SHIM_CONTROL_VALUE (GUC_DISABLE_SRAM_INIT_TO_ZEROES | \
88 GUC_ENABLE_READ_CACHE_LOGIC | \
89 GUC_ENABLE_MIA_CACHING | \
90 GUC_ENABLE_READ_CACHE_FOR_SRAM_DATA | \
91 GUC_ENABLE_READ_CACHE_FOR_WOPCM_DATA | \
92 GUC_ENABLE_MIA_CLOCK_GATING)
93
94#define HOST2GUC_INTERRUPT 0xc4c8
95#define HOST2GUC_TRIGGER (1<<0)
96
97#define DRBMISC1 0x1984
98#define DOORBELL_ENABLE (1<<0)
99
100#define GEN8_DRBREGL(x) (0x1000 + (x) * 8)
101#define GEN8_DRB_VALID (1<<0)
102#define GEN8_DRBREGU(x) (GEN8_DRBREGL(x) + 4)
103
104#define DE_GUCRMR 0x44054
105
106#define GUC_BCS_RCS_IER 0xC550
107#define GUC_VCS2_VCS1_IER 0xC554
108#define GUC_WD_VECS_IER 0xC558
109#define GUC_PM_P24C_IER 0xC55C
110
111#endif
112
